erp_sku.notes: Used as the item ID. The prefix convention distinguishes ERP-sourced items from other sources.

name.example: Organic Whole Milk 1L -> Organic Whole Milk 1L
name.notes: Display name shown in POS and back-office systems.

description.example: Fresh organic whole milk 1 litre -> Fresh organic whole milk 1 litre
description.notes: Optional detailed description of the item.

category.transform: lowercase and include in tags array
category.notes: ERP category is mapped to tags for searchability. Can also be mapped to itemCategoryId if category IDs are set up.

unit_of_sale.notes: Must be one of: EA, KG, KRM, GRM, LTR, MLT, MTR, CMT, MMT, M2, M3.

is_active.notes: Controls whether the item is active or soft-deleted.

type.transform: Derived from ERP category: Services -> SERVICE, all others -> STOCK_ITEM
type.notes: Item classification type. Most ERP products map to STOCK_ITEM.

referencePriceUnitOfMeasurement.transform: Derived from unit_of_sale: KG -> KG, LTR -> LTR, EA with liquid content -> LTR, otherwise -> EA
referencePriceUnitOfMeasurement.notes: Unit for the comparison price label (e.g. price per litre).

referencePriceConversionFactor.transform: Calculated from net_content and reference unit. For 1L milk sold EA with reference LTR: factor = 1.0
referencePriceConversionFactor.notes: Conversion factor for calculating the reference (comparison) price.

availableInPos.notes: Whether the item can be sold at POS terminals.

assortmentPolicyType.notes: Controls whether item is included in the store assortment.

businessUnitGroupId.transform: Set from integration configuration, not from ERP data
businessUnitGroupId.notes: The tenant's business unit group. Configured per integration, not per product.

erp_sku.transform: Same transform as item.id: prefix with 'erp-item-' and lowercase
erp_sku.notes: References the item this price belongs to. Must match the item ID.

price.notes: The price value. Includes tax by default (excludingTax: false).

tax_group.notes: Tax group identifier. Must match a configured tax group in Hii Retail.

valid_from.transform: Append T00:00:00Z to convert date to ISO 8601 datetime
valid_from.notes: Start of price validity. Time zone assumed UTC.

type.transform: Default NORMAL for standard ERP prices
type.notes: Price type. ERP base prices map to NORMAL. Campaign/promo prices map to CAMPAIGN.

excludingTax.transform: Default false (ERP prices are assumed tax-inclusive)
excludingTax.notes: Set to true if ERP exports prices without VAT.

businessUnitGroupId.notes: Must match the item's business unit group.

erp_sku.transform: Same transform as item.id: prefix with 'erp-item-' and lowercase
erp_sku.notes: References the item this identifier belongs to. Must match the item ID.

gtin.notes: The actual barcode or code value. GTIN types are validated for correct check digit.

identifier_type.notes: Must be one of: GTIN8, GTIN12, GTIN13, GTIN14, GTIN, PLU, SKU, QR, ECC200, etc.

businessUnitGroupId.notes: Must match the item's business unit group.
